verbs.description: NEW YORK ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: revealed] [ARGM-LOC: in his financial disclosure] [ARG1: that he reimbursed personal attorney Michael Cohen as much as $ 250,000 for unspecified " expenses , " with]

NEW YORK ( AP ) — President Donald Trump revealed in his financial disclosure that [ARG0: he] [V: reimbursed] [ARG2: personal attorney Michael Cohen] [ARG1: as much as $ 250,000] [ARG3: for unspecified " expenses] , " [ARGM-MNR: with]
